name: test_low_fee[plutus_v1]
description:
Test minting a token when fee is set too low.

        Expect failure.

        * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral
        * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
        * try to mint a token using a Plutus script when fee is set lower than is the computed fee
        * check that minting failed because the fee amount was too low
descriptionHtml:
Test minting a token when fee is set too low.

    Expect failure.

    * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral
    * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
    * try to mint a token using a Plutus script when fee is set lower than is the computed fee
    * check that minting failed because the fee amount was too low
statusMessage: Skipped: Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests3/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_mint_raw.py', 1373, 'Skipped: Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')
